data.title: Jensen Huang Just Teased A Big 2025 Reveal For Friday — Just Months After Analysts Called Nvidia Robotics The 'De Facto' Standard - Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META), Amazon.com (NASDAQ:AMZN)
data.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's playful video teasing a big robotics reveal for Friday has intensified speculation about the company's expanding AI robotics push, which analysts say is rapidly becoming the industry's "de facto" standard.
data.author: Ananya Gairola
